record.text:
I am proud to be at the forefront of the fight to hold the fascists in the administration accountable, and end the terror in our communities.
 
Read my conversation with Public Notice here: www.publicnotice.co/p/delia-rami...
More and more of my colleagues are finally starting to realize what we knew: Reforms are not enough. We must MELT ICE and dismantle DHS.

Good morning. The President of the United States was in the middle of the most serious child sex trafficking ring of the last quarter century. 

He is referenced not a dozen times in the case files. Not 100 times. Not 1,000 times. He’s referenced 38,000 times.

external.title: Impeaching Trump Revisited: ‘He Has Not Changed’

record.text:
6 years ago this week, I warned the Senate how dangerous Trump would be if they did not convict him.

I said he would not change, and that he would continue trying to cheat in our elections. 

I didn’t imagine then how right that would be. youtu.be/9FxNBDUGMmE?...

external.title: Impeaching Trump Revisited: ‘He Has Not Changed’

record.text: Here are 4 ways Trump is trying to undermine our fair and free elections—and why we've got to keep calling him out.

Join my office at my annual Youth Opportunities Fair & connect with organizations offering jobs, internships, mentoring, camps, & volunteer opportunities.

Youth of all ages are welcome. There will be select programs for students in grades K–8.

Your next opportunity starts here.
Thanks to Maha Friej and her team for the visit.

It was a great Friday afternoon at the Arab American National Museum spending time learning more about the history, culture, and contributions of Arab Americans to our state. The museum is a national leader on telling often untold stories to a wide audience.

record.text: When I wrote Section 230 I did so knowing it would be critical for protecting free speech online. 30 years later and it’s one of the last things standing in the way of Republican censorship of the internet. Here’s to many more years of defending this vital safeguard of free speech.

external.title: Prosecutors Began Investigating Renee Good’s Killing. Washington Told Them to Stop.

record.text:
Kash Patel stopped FBI agents from investigating Renee Good’s killing because the findings might’ve contradicted their narrative that she was a “domestic terrorist.”

We cannot trust a word coming out of this Admin.

DHS must allow Minnesotan authorities to investigate, NOW.

external.title: Prosecutors Began Investigating Renee Good’s Killing. Washington Told Them to Stop.

record.text:
Great discussion with Minnesota ag leaders. 
 
Farmers are struggling because of the administration’s tariffs: lost export markets, higher input costs and uncertainty.

We need to end the tariff chaos to keep family farms strong and put year-round E-15 in place.

I’m thinking of Shirley Chisholm this #BlackHistoryMonth. I stand on her shoulders, carrying forward her vision in service to my district and our communities. Because she dared to run, I dared to lead. Unbossed and unbought, always.
The biggest fraud ever perpetrated in America:

Wondering what a day in the life looks like for a U.S. Member of Congress?
 
Follow me along!

In December, I told you about how Trump’s Department of Education is stripping nurses of our professional status and making school more expensive.

From now until March 2, we need you to raise your voice and submit a public comment: www.federalregister.gov/documents/20...

value.text: As the only Democratic nurse in Congress, I remember how expensive pursuing my degree was. And now, Trump’s Education Department is moving to make it even more expensive. Here’s how you can help.

record.text:
Millions lost health care so Washington Republicans could give their rich friends yet another tax cut.

Donald Trump and JD Vance think that's a win.

I think it's a moral tragedy.

Systemic failures at the Department of Veterans Affairs continue to harm our veterans and rob them of their benefits.

We need real oversight and accountability on how the Administration's restructuring of the VA has affected the services veterans earned.
www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news...

images.alt:
Screenshot of headline reading: Renee Good's partner addresses Minneapolis immigration crackdown one month after killing

Becca Good has seldom spoken out since Renee Good was shot and killed by an ICE agent in Minneapolis on Jan. 7.

record.text: “Renee was not the first person killed, and she was not the last. You know my wife’s name and you know Alex’s name, but there are many others in this city being harmed that you don’t know—their families are hurting just like mine, even if they don’t look like mine.”

record.text:
I served with the U.S. Attorneys Office in LA for almost 6 years. 

It was a great office, professional and apolitical. 

My heart breaks for the many hundreds of dedicated prosecutors who have been forced to leave rather than engage in unethical conduct. 

But they have made the right decision.

record.text: President Trump is trying to shut down the Department of Education and leave our schools and children out to dry – and I’m just not having it. I was at Pulaski High School to hear about the chaos the President has created and talk about my bill to stand up to it.

Your voice matters. 

If Secretary Noem’s immigration enforcement has directly affected you, I encourage you to come forward and share your story.

We may not have made the Super Bowl this year, but just as General Washington crossed the Delaware to rout the Red Coats and ultimately win independence, the Lions are going to win it all next year!
We may not have made the Super Bowl this year, but just as General Washington crossed the Delaware to rout the Red Coats and ultimately win independence, the Lions are going to win it all next year!

If you come and visit my office in DC, chances are you’ll be in one of two conference rooms, named for two things that ALL Michiganders can agree on: our love for our Great Lakes, and our love for our teams. So it’s only fitting that our newest piece of art is sports-themed.

As Superbowl Sunday looms—with $1.67 billion in bets expected—Americans need protection against online sports betting companies & prediction markets that exploit problem gamblers. My legislation is a start.

record.text:
From Dr. King to Shirley Chisholm, the Divine Nine has shaped our nation’s path. 

We fought for voting rights, civil rights, and opportunity for all. 

As attacks on our history and DEI continue, we stand firm. Black history is American history, and we’re not going back.

record.text: www.newsweek.com/us-abortion-...
Reminder: Republican abortion bans have NOTHING to do with protecting women and EVERYTHING to do with controlling women’s bodies and lives.

It took the outcry of a nation to bring 5-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father back to Minnesota from an ICE detention facility, and now the Trump administration is trying to fast-track their deportations.

The cruelty of this administration has no limits.

Measles on the rise.
Masked agents in the street.
The President seizing ballots.

This is America under Donald Trump. We deserve better.

Talk doesn’t lower prices. Savings don’t happen by accident.

They happen when we fight and win.
